chronicle.entry: In the first breath of creation, two eyes opened in the darkness — THE WATCHERS — ancient sentinels who drift and observe, reporting all movement to the depths below.
The prisoner discovered they could shape raw dungeon energy into luminous bolts — the machine's own essence turned against its creations.
When the first Watcher fell to luminous fire, its essence didn't fade — instead, crimson droplets of condensed vitality materialized, drawn from the machine's recycling protocols.
